  • Constructor Details

    • DurabilityManager

      public DurabilityManager(NBTEditor nbtEditor, ConfigLoader config)

  • Method Details

    • setCombinedDurability

      public int setCombinedDurability(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack armoredElytraOut, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack armoredElytraIn, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack other, ArmorTier currentTier, ArmorTier targetTier)
      Combination of getCombinedDurability(ItemStack, ItemStack, ArmorTier, ArmorTier) and setDurability(ItemStack, int, ArmorTier).

      First gets the combined of the input armored elytra and the other item and then applies it to the target armored elytra.

      Parameters:
      armoredElytraOut - The output armored elytra item. This is the elytra that will be updated.
      armoredElytraIn - The input armored elytra item.
      other - The other item that will be combined with the armored elytra. This can be another armored elytra, a chestplate, or any other item.
      currentTier - The current armor tier of the armored elytra.
      targetTier - The target tier of the armored elytra.

    • getCombinedDurability

      public int getCombinedDurability(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack armoredElytra, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack other, ArmorTier currentTier, ArmorTier targetTier)
      Gets durability value resulting from combining an armored elytra with some other item with durability.
      Parameters:
      armoredElytra - The armored elytra item.
      other - The other item that will be combined with the armored elytra. This can be another armored elytra, a chestplate, or any other item.
      currentTier - The current armor tier of the armored elytra.
      targetTier - The target tier of the armored elytra.
      Returns:
      The new real durability value of the armored elytra if it were to be combined with the other item.

    • removeDurability

      public int removeDurability(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack armoredElytra, int durabilityLoss, @Nullable ArmorTier providedTier)
      Removes durability from an armored elytra.
      Parameters:
      armoredElytra - The armored elytra item to damage.
      durabilityLoss - The amount of durability to remove from the armored elytra.
      providedTier - The tier of the armored elytra (if this is available). If this is null, it will be retrieved from the item itself.
      Returns:
      The new durability after removing the provided amount.

    • getFullRepairItemCount

      public int getFullRepairItemCount(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack armoredElytra, @Nullable ArmorTier providedTier)
      Gets the required number of repair items required to fully repair an armored elytra.

      For example, for an ArmoredElytra that is damaged for 50 durability and its repair item restores 40 durability, this method would return 2.

      Parameters:
      armoredElytra - The armored elytra item for which to check how many items are needed to fully repair it.
      providedTier - The tier of the armored elytra (if this is available). If this is null, it will be retrieved from the item itself.
      Returns:
      The required number of repair items required to fully repair the armored elytra.

    • getRepairedDurability

      public int getRepairedDurability(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack armoredElytra, int repairCount, @Nullable ArmorTier providedTier)
      Gets the new durability of an armored elytra if it were to be repaired right now.
      Parameters:
      armoredElytra - The armored elytra item for which to check what the new durability would be after repairing it.
      repairCount - The number of repair items.
      providedTier - The tier of the armored elytra (if this is available). If this is null, it will be retrieved from the item itself.
      Returns:
      The real durability value of the armored elytra if it were to be repaired.

    • getRealDurability

      public int getRealDurability(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, @Nullable ArmorTier providedTier)
      Gets the real durability of an item.

      If the item is an armored elytra, and it does not have a real durability yet, it will be upgraded.

      Parameters:
      item - The item for which to figure out the real durability.
      providedTier - The tier of the armored elytra (if this is available). If this is null, it will be retrieved from the item itself.
      Returns:
      The real durability of the item.

    • setDurability

      public void setDurability(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item, int durability, @Nullable ArmorTier providedTier)
      Sets the durability values (real + shown) of an armored elytra.
      Parameters:
      item - The armored elytra item for which to set the durability values.
      durability - The real durability value.
      providedTier - The tier of the armored elytra (if this is available). If this is null, it will be retrieved from the item itself.

    • isBroken

      public boolean isBroken(int durability, ArmorTier armorTier)
      Checks if an armored elytra should be considered 'broken'.
      Parameters:
      durability - The current 'real' durability. See getRealDurability(ItemStack, ArmorTier).
      armorTier - The armor tier for which to check.
      Returns:
      True if the provided durability should be considered 'broken' for the provided armor tier.

    • isBroken

      public boolean isBroken(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack armoredElytra, @Nullable ArmorTier armorTier)
      Checks if an armored elytra should be considered 'broken'.
      Parameters:
      armoredElytra - The armored elytra to check.
      armorTier - The armor tier for which to check.
      Returns:
      True if the provided armored elytra should be considered 'broken'.
